publicIpRouting_explanation: The page below lists all the locations where your public IP addresses are routed to this vRack.
publicIpRouting_note_value: The public bandwidth displayed is specific to this vRack and the region, and represents the outgoing traffic (from the OVHcloud network to the Internet) used by all additional IP addresses in this location.
publicIpRouting_purpose: Use the vRack to expose your services to the Internet when necessary.
publicIpRouting_no_eligible_region_found: No additional IP addresses have been routed to this vRack and no custom public bandwidth option has been found.
publicIpRouting_region_attach_additional: Associate an Additional IP block to the vRack ({{region}})
You can add blocks of Additional IP addresses ordered in the selected region. If an IP address block does not appear in the list, it may be associated with another product or another region.
IPv6 blocks must be added one by one.
Unable to associate the IP address to the vRack: {{apiError}}
No IP block is eligible for this region
publicIpRouting_region_attached_ip_slaac: Enabling SLAAC facilitates IPv6 addressing, but avoid using it with multiple regions used by vRack.
publicIpRouting_region_detach_ip_tooltip: Remove the IP addresses from your vRack
publicIpRouting_region_detach_ip_message: Are you sure you want to detach {{ip}} from your vRack?
publicIpRouting_region_detach_ip_success: IP address detached successfully (and placed in the 'IP Parking')
publicIpRouting_region_detach_ip_error: Unable to detach the IP address from the vRack: {{apiError}}
publicIpRouting_region_detach_ipv6_title: Detach a block of Additional IPs
publicIpRouting_region_detach_ipv6_messa: You are about to detach the block {{ip}} from your vRack. All subnets configured with this block will be removed.
publicIpRouting_region_detach_subrange_t: Remove the subnet from your vRack
Remove the subnet from your vRack
publicIpRouting_region_detach_subrange_m: Do you confirm you want to remove the subnet from your vRack?
publicIpRouting_region_detach_subrange_e: Unable to remove the subnet from the vRack: {{apiError}}
publicIpRouting_modify_bandwidth_content: Please select a new public bandwidth option for your vRack {{ vrack }} in {{ region }}. Please note that the effective start date and billing may vary.
publicIpRouting_effective_next_cycle_mes: Effective from the next billing cycle
publicIpRouting_modify_bandwidth_bottom_: When you place an order, a new tab opens and you are automatically redirected to the payment interface to complete the process.
publicIpRouting_success_order_message: Your order has started in a new tab. Please complete it to finalise your purchase. If the new tab does not open, <Link>click here.</Link>
publicIpRouting_success_downgrade_to_def: Your bandwidth will revert to the default option in the next billing cycle. No order is necessary.
upgrade_bandwidth_info_tooltip: Pro-rata billing applies for the remaining days of your current billing cycle and full pricing starts in the next billing cycle.
